meaningMnemonic: You know that 笑う is "to laugh." This is the noun version, because the う in 笑う turns to い (so don't confuse this as an adjective). What is the noun version of "to laugh"? It's <vocabulary>a laugh</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as 笑う, so just make sure you know that so you can know this as well.
